definition[0]: a polite word for a man, used especially when talking to or about a man you do not know
example[0]: Could you serve this gentleman please, Miss Bath?
example[2]: An elderly gentleman was asleep next to the fire.
definition[1]: a man who is always polite, has good manners, and treats other people well
example[3]: Martin – always the perfect gentleman – got to his feet when my mother walked in.
example[4]: Mr Field was a real gentleman.
definition[2]: a man from a high social class, especially one whose family owns a lot of property
